title: Calories in 12 oz Ribeye Steak
meta_description: Get the calories in ribeye steak 12 oz, including total nutrition facts, protein, fat breakdown, and simple tweaks for different preparations.
assumptions: Boneless ribeye steak, USDA choice grade, cooked broiled, separable lean and fat, trimmed to 0" fat; 12 oz â‰ˆ 340 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut, grade, cooking method, fat trimming, and portion size. Check labels or USDA data for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A 12 oz broiled ribeye steak provides about 989 kcal and 84 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Grilled with 1 tsp oil added per 100 g
Leaner trim (remove visible fat) per 100 g
Pan-seared in 1 tbsp butter per steak

faqs.q: How many calories in 12 oz ribeye steak?
faqs.a: Approximately 989 kcal for a broiled, choice-grade ribeye.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 12 oz ribeye steak?
faqs.a: About 84 g of protein, making it a high-protein option.

faqs.q: Is ribeye steak high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 74 g total fat per 12 oz, with 32 g saturated.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in ribeye steak?
faqs.a: Broiling keeps it lower; frying or adding oil/butter can add 40-100+ kcal.

faqs.q: Cholesterol and sodium in 12 oz ribeye?
faqs.a: About 279 mg cholesterol and 197 mg sodium under standard assumptions.
